summary: This test module verifies the initialization, configuration, and reset behavior of various logging callbacks used by the Litellm library. It provides helper utilities to set and clear environment variables, reset all registered callbacks, and contains unit tests that check dynamic logging activation, combined callback aggregation, compatibility of custom logger classes, and the usage of a callback during an LLM request.
business_intent: Ensure that logging and observability integrations for the Litellm platform can be correctly enabled, customized, and cleared, guaranteeing reliable monitoring and metric collection across different deployment configurations.
